name: A Mysterious Text
description:
NOTE: THIS PROJECT IS UNFINISHED

I am in the constant process of writing this interactive narrative, but I want to put it up here for anyone to check it out, provide feedback or comments.  

Story:  When walking home from school one day, you receive a mysterious text from an unknown number.  The person says they are a girl who has been kidnapped and she needs your help.  Is it spam? Do you believe her? Is it all a trick?  Make decisions that dictate how your story will go and decide what type of person you are!
